ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have you really considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have you ever thought about al-Lat and al-Uzza,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Can anything as such be considered true) of al-Lat, al-Uzza,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So did you observe the idols Lat and Uzza?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Have you then considered Al-Lat, and Al-`Uzza.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have you then considered the Lat and the Uzza,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have you considered El-Lat and El-'Uzza
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have ye thought upon Al-Lat and Al-'Uzza
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have you really considered al-Lat and al-"Uzza,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have ye then considered Al-Lat and AL-'uzza:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Have you then considered Al-Lat, and Al-'Uzza (two idols of the pagan Arabs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Among the idols) have you considered allat and al'uzza,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have you considered al-Lat and al-Uzza?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:19] Have you considered al-Lāt and al-‘Uzzā,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have ye) people of Mecca (thought upon al-Lat and al-'Uzza
